mapper.select: select count(token) from tb_member_token where token=#{token}
select wl_categorys,wl_sort from tb_web_layout where del_flag='N' and wl_category=#{category} and wl_type='A';

select idx, wl_title, wl_link_type, wl_link_idx, wl_type, wl_height, wl_unit, wl_categorys, wl_attribute, wl_sort, reg_dt, edit_dt, reg_ip, del_flag, wl_category from tb_web_layout where del_flag='N' and wl_category=#{category} and wl_type not in('A');

select (a.idx) as vod_idx, (select vod_path from tb_vod_repository where idx=a.vod_repo) as vod_path, (a.board_title) as vod_title, (a.board_content) as vod_content, ifnull(a.board_keyword,'') as vod_keyword, (select vod_play_time from tb_vod_repository where idx=a.vod_repo) as vod_play_time, (a.favorite_count) as favorite_count, (a.view_count) as view_count, (select main_thumbnail from tb_vod_repository where idx=a.vod_repo) as main_thumbnail, (select pid from tb_board_category where idx=a.category_idx) as board_cate_idx, (select category_name from tb_board_category where idx=board_cate_idx) as board_cate_name from tb_board_repository a where 1=1 and a.del_flag='N'
and a.category_idx in
#{type}
order by a.reg_dt desc
order by a.view_count desc
limit 0,10
select idx from tb_board_category where pid=#{category} order by position asc

select (a.idx) as vod_idx, (select vod_path from tb_vod_repository where idx=a.vod_repo) as vod_path, (a.board_title) as vod_title, (a.board_content) as vod_content, ifnull(a.board_keyword,'') as vod_keyword, (select vod_play_time from tb_vod_repository where idx=a.vod_repo) as vod_play_time, (a.favorite_count) as favorite_count, (a.view_count) as view_count, (select main_thumbnail from tb_vod_repository where idx=a.vod_repo) as main_thumbnail, (a.category_idx) as board_cate_idx, (select category_name from tb_board_category where idx=a.category_idx) as board_cate_name, (select resolution from tb_vod_box where repoIdx=a.vod_repo) as vod_reoslution, date_format(reg_dt,'%Y.%m.%d') as vod_regdate, (select file_size from tb_vod_box where repoIdx=a.vod_repo) as vod_volume, (select count(idx) from tb_favorite_contents where member_account=#{member_id} and board_idx=#{vod_idx} and del_flag = "N") as favorite_yn from tb_board_repository a where idx= #{vod_idx}
select (idx) as board_cate_idx,(category_name) as board_cate_name from tb_board_category where pid=#{category} order by position asc;
select count(idx) from tb_favorite_contents where member_account=#{member_id} and board_idx=#{vod_idx} and del_flag='N';
mapper.update: update tb_favorite_contents set del_flag='Y' where member_account=#{member_id} and board_idx=#{vod_idx}
mapper.select: select file_repo from tb_board_repository where idx = #{vod_idx} and del_flag = "N"
select photo_repo from tb_board_repository where idx = #{vod_idx} and del_flag = "N"

select b.idx as vod_idx, c.vod_path, c.vod_title, c.vod_content, c.vod_keyword, c.vod_play_time, c.favorite_count, c.view_count, c.main_thumbnail, b.category_idx as board_cate_idx, b.board_title as board_cate_name, b.reg_dt as vod_regdate from tb_favorite_contents a left join tb_board_repository b on a.board_idx = b.idx left join tb_vod_repository c on b.vod_repo = c.idx where a.member_account = #{member_id} and a.del_flag = "N"
AND (b.board_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR vod_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%'))
select channel_idx from tb_live_channel_target a left join tb_live_category b on a.channel_idx = b.idx where a.group_idx = 0 and b.category_name is not null;

select c.idx as vod_idx, a.play_order, c.vod_path, c.vod_play_time from tb_stb_schedule_vod a left join tb_stb_schedule b on a.schedule_id = b.idx left join tb_vod_repository c on a.vod_id = c.idx where b.idx = #{vod_idx} and c.del_flag = "N"
select member_name as user_name, member_profile as user_profile_img from tb_account_member where member_id = #{member_id}

SELECT b.idx AS vod_idx, a.vod_path, b.board_title AS vod_title, b.board_content AS vod_content, IFNULL(b.board_keyword,'') AS vod_keyword, a.vod_play_time AS vod_play_time, b.favorite_count AS favorite_count, b.view_count AS view_count, a.main_thumbnail, b.category_idx AS board_cate_idx, (SELECT category_name FROM tb_board_category WHERE idx=a.category_idx) AS board_cate_name, DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'%Y.%m.%d') AS vod_regdate FROM tb_vod_repository a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_board_repository b ON a.idx=b.vod_repo WHERE 1=1 AND b.del_flag='N'
AND (b.board_title like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR b.board_content like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR (select category_name from tb_vod_category where idx=a.category_idx) like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR vod_keyword like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%'))
